ArticleTitle.sentence: Towards a molecular understanding of T-cell differentiation.

event.clue: Towards a molecular understanding of T-cell differentiation.

AbstractText.sentence: Lymphoid differentiation is one of the best studied examples of mammalian development.

event.clue: Lymphoid differentiation is one of the best studied examples of mammalian development.
Lymphoid differentiation is one of the best studied examples of mammalian development.

AbstractText.sentence: Here Hans Clevers and Michael Owen describe how the cloning of the genes that encode T-cell-specific membrane proteins allows the identification of transcription factors that control the expression of these T-cell genes.

event.clue: Here Hans Clevers and Michael Owen describe how the cloning of the genes that encode T-cell-specific membrane proteins allows the identification of transcription factors that control the expression of these T-cell genes.

Here Hans Clevers and Michael Owen describe how the cloning of the genes that encode T-cell-specific membrane proteins allows the identification of transcription factors that control the expression of these T-cell genes.

AbstractText.sentence: Such transcription factors play a key role in the development of the mature T-cell phenotype by functioning as 'master regulators of T-cell differentiation'.

event.clue: Such transcription factors play a key role in the development of the mature T-cell phenotype by functioning as 'master regulators of T-cell differentiation'.
Such transcription factors play a key role in the development of the mature T-cell phenotype by functioning as 'master regulators of T-cell differentiation'.
